Class User_Request

java.lang.Object
com.example.SpotifyWebAPI.WebRequest.User_Request
public class User_Request extends Object
Class of requests that require Refresh Token with specific scopes

  • Method Details

    • getPlaylist

      public Playlist getPlaylist()

    • setPlaylistDetails

      public void setPlaylistDetails(String playlist_id, String name, String description, boolean publicPlaylist, boolean collaborative)
      Sets the details of the playlist with given ID. Requires playlist-modify-public scope
      Parameters:
      playlist_id - Playlist to modify details of
      name - New name to set
      description - New description to set
      publicPlaylist - Set playlist as public (Appear on profile)
      collaborative - Set playlist as collaborative

    • buildURL

      private String buildURL(String fullURL, int offset, int limit)
      Builds request URL
      Parameters:
      fullURL - Base URL
      offset - Starting point. If not given "offset is greater or equal to 0" then it just appends limit
      limit - Limit of how many items to request
      Returns:
      Built URL as string

    • getPlaylistItems

      public void getPlaylistItems(String playlist_id, int offset, int limit)
      Gets items of the playlist with given starting point and limits. Requires playlist-read-private scope
      Parameters:
      playlist_id - Playlist to modify details of
      offset - Starting point
      limit - Limit of how many items to request

    • addFromPreviousPlaylist

      private com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode addFromPreviousPlaylist(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper)
      Adds items from Hashmap to JSON Array Node
      Parameters:
      mapper - JSON ObjectMapper object
      Returns:
      arrayNode for JSON POST body

    • addPlaylistItems

      public void addPlaylistItems(String playlist_id, int position, String track_uri, boolean addFromPreviousPlaylist)
      Adds items to playlist with given ID
      Parameters:
      playlist_id - Playlist to modify details of
      position - Starting position to add items
      track_uri - Track uri of items to be added
      addFromPreviousPlaylist - Whether to add items from previous playlist. Will add songs from Hashmap songs

    • createPlaylist

      public void createPlaylist(String user_id, String playlistName, String playlistDescription)
      Creates playlist with given name and description. Creates a public non-collaborative playlist
      Parameters:
      user_id - ID for the user that playlist will be created for
      playlistName - Name of the playlist
      playlistDescription - Description for the playlist
